entry.title: Last Week Tonight
entry.content:
If you are wondering about the origin of the name of this site, John Oliver explains it best.

The reference to â€œdesigned by clownsâ€ is at 23:00, but you should really watch the whole thing because its friday, and you deserve a good laugh.

Enjoy!
